attributes.action: force Hazel Blears to pay any profit made on the sale of her London properties, paid for by tax payers, to the fees office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hazel Blears MP for Salford, has agreed to pay the CGT relevant to the profit made on the sale of London properties to the fees office. Why should she and other MPs be allowed to keep the profit made on sale when the tax payer has paid for the mortage?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
